title: Pirates, Burners & Kits
description: The crew takes a voicemail about the best and worst music collaborations (0:25), why all the big news happens after we post a podcast (16:00), a quick update on the Stanley Cup playoffs (29:00), Katie's definitive list of sports that other sport's athletes would be bad at (32:00), why you should sometimes wait longer than 14 years to ask a question (46:00) and picking the best World Cup kits (1:00:00).

itunes:author: ESPN, Katie Nolan
